input.sentences: last night | i went to an inspirational workshop .
there were a lot of people there to be inspired .
there | i got to meet more people who had become successful with the help of the program .
output.sentences: We decided to have some drinks at work.
There were a lot of people there, and they were all happy that they finally got a break.
There were some talks about improving the workspace which increased the morale of our workers.
Some of us went around to the high ranking executives asking why they did this.
The rest of us decided to not ask questions and to simply accept this reward.
